# Layout Components Usage Guide

## Overview

The Acutrack Design System provides a comprehensive set of layout components to help you build responsive, screen-friendly layouts. These components work together to create consistent, accessible, and maintainable user interfaces.

## Components Overview

### Core Layout Components
- **Layout** - Main layout wrapper with flexible configuration
- **Container** - Content width management and responsive containers
- **Grid** - Responsive grid system for content organization
- **Card** - Flexible content containers with multiple variants

### Layout Structure Components
- **LayoutHeader** - Page header with sticky and elevation options
- **Main** - Main content area with responsive width management
- **LayoutSidebar** - Sidebar with responsive width and positioning
- **Footer** - Page footer with elevation and background options
- **Content** - Content wrapper with padding and styling options

### Multi-Column Layouts
- **TwoColumnLayout** - Two-column responsive layout
- **ThreeColumnLayout** - Three-column responsive layout

---

## Layout Component

The main layout wrapper that provides the foundation for your page structure.

### Basic Usage

```tsx
import { Layout } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function App() {
  return (
    <Layout hasMinHeight isColumn isFullWidth>
      <div>Your content here</div>
    </Layout>
  );
}
```

### Props Reference

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `children` | `React.ReactNode` | - | Content to display inside the layout |
| `size` | `'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl' \| '2xl' \| 'full' \| 'screen'` | - | Layout size variant |
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'dashboard' \| 'landing' \| 'admin' \| 'minimal' \| 'elevated'` | - | Visual variant |
| `color` | `'primary' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'danger' \| 'info'` | - | Color theme |
| `hasMinHeight` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether layout has minimum viewport height |
| `isColumn` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether layout uses flexbox column direction |
| `isFullWidth` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether layout is full width |
| `hasBackground` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout has background |
| `hasBorder` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout has border |
| `hasRoundedCorners` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout has rounded corners |
| `hasShadow` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout has shadow |
| `isLoading` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout is in loading state |
| `isError` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout is in error state |
| `isWarning` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout is in warning state |
| `isSuccess` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout is in success state |
| `isInfo` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether layout is in info state |

### Examples

#### Dashboard Layout
```tsx
<Layout 
  variant="dashboard" 
  hasBackground 
  hasBorder 
  hasRoundedCorners 
  hasShadow
>
  <LayoutHeader isSticky hasElevation>
    <h1>Dashboard</h1>
  </LayoutHeader>
  <Main hasPadding>
    <div>Dashboard content</div>
  </Main>
  <Footer hasBackground>
    <p>© 2024 Acutrack</p>
  </Footer>
</Layout>
```

#### Landing Page Layout
```tsx
<Layout 
  variant="landing" 
  hasMinHeight 
  isColumn 
  isFullWidth
>
  <LayoutHeader hasBackground isBordered>
    <nav>Navigation</nav>
  </LayoutHeader>
  <Main fullWidth>
    <div>Hero section</div>
    <div>Features section</div>
  </Main>
  <Footer hasBackground hasElevation>
    <div>Footer content</div>
  </Footer>
</Layout>
```

---

## Container Component

Manages content width and provides responsive containers with various size options.

### Basic Usage

```tsx
import { Container } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function App() {
  return (
    <Container size="lg" isCentered hasBackground>
      <div>Your content here</div>
    </Container>
  );
}
```

### Size Variants

| Size | Max Width | Use Case |
|------|-----------|----------|
| `xs` | `max-w-xs` (320px) | Small forms, modals |
| `sm` | `max-w-sm` (384px) | Cards, small content |
| `md` | `max-w-md` (448px) | Medium content blocks |
| `lg` | `max-w-lg` (512px) | Articles, forms |
| `xl` | `max-w-xl` (576px) | Large content blocks |
| `2xl` | `max-w-2xl` (672px) | Wide content blocks |
| `full` | `max-w-full` | Full width content |
| `screen` | `max-w-screen-lg` | Screen-constrained content |

### Props Reference

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `size` | `ContainerSize` | `'screen'` | Container size variant |
| `variant` | `'default' \| 'article' \| 'main' \| 'aside' \| 'section' \| 'card' \| 'panel' \| 'modal'` | `'default'` | Visual variant |
| `padding` | `'none' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl'` | `'md'` | Padding size |
| `isCentered` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether container is centered horizontally |
| `isFullWidth` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether container is full width |
| `hasBackground` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether container has background |
| `hasBorder` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether container has border |
| `hasRoundedCorners` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether container has rounded corners |
| `hasShadow` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether container has shadow |

### Examples

#### Article Container
```tsx
<Container 
  variant="article" 
  size="2xl" 
  padding="lg"
  hasBackground 
  hasRoundedCorners 
  hasShadow
>
  <h1>Article Title</h1>
  <p>Article content...</p>
</Container>
```

#### Modal Container
```tsx
<Container 
  variant="modal" 
  size="md" 
  padding="lg"
  isCentered
  hasBackground 
  hasBorder 
  hasRoundedCorners 
  hasShadow
>
  <h2>Modal Title</h2>
  <p>Modal content...</p>
</Container>
```

---

## Grid Component

Provides a responsive grid system for organizing content into columns and rows.

### Basic Usage

```tsx
import { Grid } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function App() {
  return (
    <Grid cols={{ xs: 1, sm: 2, md: 3, lg: 4 }} gap={6}>
      <div>Grid Item 1</div>
      <div>Grid Item 2</div>
      <div>Grid Item 3</div>
      <div>Grid Item 4</div>
    </Grid>
  );
}
```

### Responsive Column Configuration

```tsx
// Simple number of columns (applies to all screen sizes)
<Grid cols={3} gap={4}>
  {/* 3 columns on all screen sizes */}
</Grid>

// Responsive configuration
<Grid cols={{ 
  xs: 1,    // 1 column on mobile
  sm: 2,    // 2 columns on small screens
  md: 3,    // 3 columns on medium screens
  lg: 4,    // 4 columns on large screens
  xl: 5,    // 5 columns on extra large screens
  '2xl': 6  // 6 columns on 2xl screens
}} gap={6}>
  {/* Responsive grid items */}
</Grid>
```

### Gap Sizes

| Gap | Tailwind Class | Spacing |
|-----|----------------|---------|
| `1` | `gap-1` | 4px |
| `2` | `gap-2` | 8px |
| `3` | `gap-3` | 12px |
| `4` | `gap-4` | 16px |
| `5` | `gap-5` | 20px |
| `6` | `gap-6` | 24px |
| `8` | `gap-8` | 32px |
| `10` | `gap-10` | 40px |
| `12` | `gap-12` | 48px |
| `16` | `gap-16` | 64px |
| `20` | `gap-20` | 80px |
| `24` | `gap-24` | 96px |
| `32` | `gap-32` | 128px |

### Props Reference

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `cols` | `number \| ResponsiveColumns` | `1` | Number of columns or responsive config |
| `gap` | `GridGap` | `6` | Gap size between grid items |
| `hasBackground` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid has background |
| `isBordered` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid has borders |
| `isRounded` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid has rounded corners |
| `hasShadow` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid has shadow |
| `hasBackdropBlur` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid has backdrop blur |
| `hasGlassMorphism` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid has glass morphism effect |
| `isLoading` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether grid is in loading state |
| `hasLoadingText` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether to show loading text |
| `loadingText` | `string` | `'Loading...'` | Text to display during loading |

### Grid Item Component

```tsx
import { Grid } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function App() {
  return (
    <Grid cols={{ sm: 2, md: 3 }} gap={6}>
      <Grid.Item span={2} sm={1} md={2}>
        <div>Spans 2 columns on mobile, 1 on sm, 2 on md+</div>
      </Grid.Item>
      <Grid.Item span={1} start={3}>
        <div>Spans 1 column, starts at column 3</div>
      </Grid.Item>
    </Grid>
  );
}
```

### Examples

#### Product Grid
```tsx
<Grid 
  cols={{ xs: 1, sm: 2, md: 3, lg: 4 }} 
  gap={6}
  hasBackground 
  isRounded 
  hasShadow
>
  {products.map(product => (
    <Grid.Item key={product.id}>
      <Card isInteractive>
        <Card.Image src={product.image} alt={product.name} />
        <Card.Body>
          <h3>{product.name}</h3>
          <p>{product.price}</p>
        </Card.Body>
      </Card>
    </Grid.Item>
  ))}
</Grid>
```

#### Dashboard Widgets
```tsx
<Grid 
  cols={{ xs: 1, sm: 2, lg: 3 }} 
  gap={8}
  hasPadding
>
  <Grid.Item span={1} sm={2} lg={3}>
    <Card variant="elevated">
      <Card.Body>
        <h2>Welcome Dashboard</h2>
      </Card.Body>
    </Card>
  </Grid.Item>
  <Grid.Item>
    <Card>
      <Card.Body>
        <h3>Sales</h3>
        <p>$12,345</p>
      </Card.Body>
    </Card>
  </Grid.Item>
  <Grid.Item>
    <Card>
      <Card.Body>
        <h3>Users</h3>
        <p>1,234</p>
      </Card.Body>
    </Card>
  </Grid.Item>
</Grid>
```

---

## Card Component

Flexible content containers with multiple variants and interactive states.

### Basic Usage

```tsx
import { Card } from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function App() {
  return (
    <Card size="md" variant="default" isInteractive>
      <Card.Header>
        <h3>Card Title</h3>
      </Card.Header>
      <Card.Body>
        <p>Card content goes here</p>
      </Card.Body>
      <Card.Footer alignment="right">
        <Button>Action</Button>
      </Card.Footer>
    </Card>
  );
}
```

### Card Variants

| Variant | Description | Use Case |
|---------|-------------|----------|
| `default` | Standard card with background | General content |
| `minimal` | Transparent with no border/shadow | Subtle content blocks |
| `elevated` | Enhanced shadow and background | Important content |
| `bordered` | Strong border emphasis | Form sections |
| `filled` | Solid background | Content blocks |
| `outlined` | Border only, transparent background | Subtle emphasis |
| `ghost` | Transparent with hover effects | Interactive elements |
| `card` | Standard card styling | General use |
| `panel` | Panel-like appearance | Settings, forms |

### Card Sizes

| Size | Padding | Border Radius | Use Case |
|------|---------|---------------|----------|
| `xs` | `p-2` | `rounded-md` | Small elements |
| `sm` | `p-4` | `rounded-lg` | Compact cards |
| `md` | `p-6` | `rounded-xl` | Standard cards |
| `lg` | `p-8` | `rounded-2xl` | Large cards |
| `xl` | `p-10` | `rounded-3xl` | Extra large cards |
| `2xl` | `p-12` | `rounded-3xl` | Hero cards |

### Props Reference

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| `size` | `CardSize` | `'md'` | Card size variant |
| `variant` | `CardVariant` | `'default'` | Visual variant |
| `color` | `CardColor` | `'primary'` | Color theme |
| `isInteractive` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether card has hover effects |
| `isFeatured` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether card is featured |
| `featuredText` | `string` | `'Featured'` | Text for featured badge |
| `isBordered` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether card has border |
| `hasShadow` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether card has shadow |
| `isRounded` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether card has rounded corners |
| `fullWidth` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether card takes full width |
| `hasPadding` | `boolean` | `true` | Whether card has padding |
| `disabled` | `boolean` | `false` | Whether card is disabled |

### Card Sub-components

#### Card.Image
```tsx
<Card.Image 
  src="/image.jpg" 
  alt="Description"
  size="md"
  isAspectRatioMaintained
  isRounded
/>
```

#### Card.Header
```tsx
<Card.Header isBordered hasPadding>
  <h3>Header Content</h3>
</Card.Header>
```

#### Card.Body
```tsx
<Card.Body hasPadding isScrollable maxHeight="200px">
  <p>Body content</p>
</Card.Body>
```

#### Card.Footer
```tsx
<Card.Footer alignment="space-between" hasPadding>
  <Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>
  <Button>Save</Button>
</Card.Footer>
```

### Examples

#### Product Card
```tsx
<Card 
  size="md" 
  variant="default" 
  isInteractive 
  fullWidth
>
  <Card.Image 
    src="/product.jpg" 
    alt="Product Name"
    size="md"
  />
  <Card.Header>
    <h3>Product Name</h3>
    <p className="text-text-secondary">Category</p>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p>Product description goes here...</p>
    <div className="flex items-center gap-2 mt-4">
      <span className="text-2xl font-bold">$99.99</span>
      <span className="text-sm text-system-success">In Stock</span>
    </div>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer alignment="space-between">
    <Button variant="outline" size="sm">
      <Icon size="sm">favorite</Icon>
    </Button>
    <Button size="sm">Add to Cart</Button>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

#### Featured Card
```tsx
<Card 
  size="lg" 
  isFeatured 
  featuredText="Popular"
  isInteractive
>
  <Card.Header>
    <h2>Featured Product</h2>
  </Card.Header>
  <Card.Body>
    <p>This is a featured product with special styling.</p>
  </Card.Body>
  <Card.Footer>
    <Button>Learn More</Button>
  </Card.Footer>
</Card>
```

#### Dashboard Widget
```tsx
<Card 
  size="sm" 
  variant="panel" 
  hasShadow
>
  <Card.Body>
    <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
      <div>
        <h4 className="text-lg font-semibold">Total Sales</h4>
        <p className="text-3xl font-bold text-system-success">$12,345</p>
      </div>
      <Icon size="2xl" className="text-system-success">trending_up</Icon>
    </div>
  </Card.Body>
</Card>
```

## Layout Structure Components

### LayoutHeader

Page header with sticky positioning and elevation options.

```tsx
<LayoutHeader 
  isSticky 
  hasElevation 
  hasBackground 
  isBordered
>
  <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
    <h1>Page Title</h1>
    <nav>Navigation</nav>
  </div>
</LayoutHeader>
```

### Main

Main content area with responsive width management.

```tsx
<Main 
  fullWidth 
  hasBackground 
  hasPadding
>
  <div>Main content</div>
</Main>
```

### LayoutSidebar

Responsive sidebar with configurable width and positioning.

```tsx
<LayoutSidebar 
  width="md" 
  position="left" 
  isSticky 
  hasBackground 
  isBordered
>
  <nav>
    <ul>
      <li>Navigation Item 1</li>
      <li>Navigation Item 2</li>
    </ul>
  </nav>
</LayoutSidebar>
```

### Footer

Page footer with elevation and background options.

```tsx
<Footer 
  hasElevation 
  hasBackground 
  isBordered
>
  <div className="text-center">
    <p>© 2024 Acutrack. All rights reserved.</p>
  </div>
</Footer>
```

### Content

Content wrapper with padding and styling options.

```tsx
<Content 
  padding="lg" 
  hasBackground 
  isBordered 
  isRounded
>
  <div>Content goes here</div>
</Content>
```

---

## Multi-Column Layouts

### TwoColumnLayout

Two-column responsive layout with configurable sidebar position.

```tsx
<TwoColumnLayout 
  sidebarPosition="left" 
  gap="lg" 
  hasBackground
>
  <LayoutSidebar width="md" hasBackground>
    <nav>Sidebar content</nav>
  </LayoutSidebar>
  <Main hasPadding>
    <div>Main content</div>
  </Main>
</TwoColumnLayout>
```

### ThreeColumnLayout

Three-column responsive layout.

```tsx
<ThreeColumnLayout gap="lg" hasBackground>
  <LayoutSidebar width="sm" hasBackground>
    <nav>Left sidebar</nav>
  </LayoutSidebar>
  <Main hasPadding>
    <div>Main content</div>
  </Main>
  <LayoutSidebar width="sm" hasBackground>
    <aside>Right sidebar</aside>
  </LayoutSidebar>
</ThreeColumnLayout>
```

---

## Complete Layout Examples

### Dashboard Layout
```tsx
import { 
  Layout, 
  LayoutHeader, 
  Main, 
  LayoutSidebar, 
  Footer,
  Grid,
  Card
} from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function Dashboard() {
  return (
    <Layout variant="dashboard" hasMinHeight isColumn isFullWidth>
      <LayoutHeader isSticky hasElevation hasBackground>
        <div className="flex items-center justify-between px-6 py-4">
          <h1 className="text-xl font-semibold">Dashboard</h1>
          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
            <Button variant="outline">Settings</Button>
            <Button>Profile</Button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </LayoutHeader>
      
      <div className="flex flex-1">
        <LayoutSidebar width="md" isSticky hasBackground isBordered>
          <nav className="p-4">
            <ul className="space-y-2">
              <li><a href="#" className="block px-3 py-2 rounded hover:bg-bg-tertiary">Overview</a></li>
              <li><a href="#" className="block px-3 py-2 rounded hover:bg-bg-tertiary">Analytics</a></li>
              <li><a href="#" className="block px-3 py-2 rounded hover:bg-bg-tertiary">Reports</a></li>
            </ul>
          </nav>
        </LayoutSidebar>
        
        <Main hasPadding>
          <Grid cols={{ xs: 1, sm: 2, lg: 3 }} gap={6}>
            <Card size="sm" variant="panel">
              <Card.Body>
                <h3>Total Users</h3>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold">1,234</p>
              </Card.Body>
            </Card>
            <Card size="sm" variant="panel">
              <Card.Body>
                <h3>Revenue</h3>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold">$12,345</p>
              </Card.Body>
            </Card>
            <Card size="sm" variant="panel">
              <Card.Body>
                <h3>Orders</h3>
                <p className="text-2xl font-bold">567</p>
              </Card.Body>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
        </Main>
      </div>
      
      <Footer hasBackground hasElevation>
        <div className="px-6 py-4 text-center text-sm text-text-secondary">
          © 2024 Acutrack. All rights reserved.
        </div>
      </Footer>
    </Layout>
  );
}
```

### Landing Page Layout
```tsx
import { 
  Layout, 
  LayoutHeader, 
  Main, 
  Footer,
  Container,
  Grid,
  Card
} from '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds';

function LandingPage() {
  return (
    <Layout variant="landing" hasMinHeight isColumn isFullWidth>
      <LayoutHeader hasBackground isBordered>
        <Container size="screen" padding="md">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
            <div className="text-xl font-bold">Acutrack</div>
            <nav className="flex items-center gap-6">
              <a href="#features">Features</a>
              <a href="#pricing">Pricing</a>
              <Button>Get Started</Button>
            </nav>
          </div>
        </Container>
      </LayoutHeader>
      
      <Main>
        {/* Hero Section */}
        <section className="py-20 bg-gradient-to-r from-brand-orange to-system-info">
          <Container size="lg" isCentered>
            <div className="text-center text-white">
              <h1 className="text-5xl font-bold mb-6">Welcome to Acutrack</h1>
              <p className="text-xl mb-8">The best solution for your business needs</p>
              <Button size="lg" variant="outline" className="text-white border-white hover:bg-white hover:text-brand-orange">
                Get Started
              </Button>
            </div>
          </Container>
        </section>
        
        {/* Features Section */}
        <section className="py-16">
          <Container size="screen" padding="lg">
            <h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-center mb-12">Features</h2>
            <Grid cols={{ xs: 1, md: 3 }} gap={8}>
              <Card size="lg" variant="elevated" isInteractive>
                <Card.Body>
                  <Icon size="3xl" className="text-brand-orange mb-4">speed</Icon>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-2">Fast Performance</h3>
                  <p>Lightning-fast performance with optimized code and efficient algorithms.</p>
                </Card.Body>
              </Card>
              <Card size="lg" variant="elevated" isInteractive>
                <Card.Body>
                  <Icon size="3xl" className="text-system-success mb-4">security</Icon>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-2">Secure</h3>
                  <p>Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption and secure protocols.</p>
                </Card.Body>
              </Card>
              <Card size="lg" variant="elevated" isInteractive>
                <Card.Body>
                  <Icon size="3xl" className="text-system-info mb-4">support</Icon>
                  <h3 className="text-xl font-semibold mb-2">24/7 Support</h3>
                  <p>Round-the-clock support from our expert team to help you succeed.</p>
                </Card.Body>
              </Card>
            </Grid>
          </Container>
        </section>
      </Main>
      
      <Footer hasBackground hasElevation>
        <Container size="screen" padding="lg">
          <div className="text-center text-text-secondary">
            <p>© 2024 Acutrack. All rights reserved.</p>
          </div>
        </Container>
      </Footer>
    </Layout>
  );
}
```

---

## Best Practices

### 1. Responsive Design
- Always use responsive column configurations for Grid components
- Test layouts on different screen sizes
- Use Container size variants appropriately for content width

### 2. Accessibility
- Use semantic HTML elements when possible
- Ensure proper heading hierarchy
- Provide adequate color contrast
- Include proper ARIA labels for interactive elements

### 3. Performance
- Use appropriate Card variants to avoid unnecessary styling
- Implement lazy loading for large grids
- Optimize images in Card.Image components

### 4. Consistency
- Stick to the design system's spacing scale
- Use consistent gap sizes across similar layouts
- Maintain consistent padding and margins

### 5. Content Organization
- Use Layout structure components for page-level organization
- Use Grid for content organization within sections
- Use Card for individual content blocks
- Use Container for content width management

---

## Troubleshooting

### Common Issues

1. **Grid items not responsive**
   - Ensure you're using the responsive `cols` prop with an object
   - Check that Tailwind CSS is properly configured

2. **Cards not displaying correctly**
   - Verify that you're using the correct Card sub-components
   - Check that the Card variant and size props are valid

3. **Layout not full height**
   - Ensure `hasMinHeight` is set to `true` on the Layout component
   - Check that parent containers have proper height settings

4. **Container not centering**
   - Verify that `isCentered` is set to `true`
   - Check that the Container has a defined width

### CSS Import

Make sure to import the design system's CSS:

```tsx
import '@acutrack-bookprint/acutrack-ds/style.css';
```

This ensures all custom Tailwind classes and design system styles are properly loaded.
